(274.137)_10_

274/16 = 17 R 2
17/16  = 1  R 1
1/16   = 0  R 15

0.137*16 = 1.37+0.6+0.18+0.042 = 2.292
0.292*16 = 2.92+1.2+0.54+0.012 = 3.672
0.672*16 = 7.72+3.6+0.42+0.012 = 11.752
0.752*16 = 7.52+4.2+0.3+0.012 = 12.032

(F12.23BC)_16_



(10468.8765)_10_

10468/16 = 654 R 4
654/16   =  40 R 14
40/16    =   2 R 8
2/16     =   0 R 2

0.8765*16 = 14.024
0.024*16  = 0.384
0.384*16  = 6.144
0.144*16  = 2.304

(28E4.E062)_16_



(1243.3421)_10_

1243/16 = 77 R 11
77/16   =  4 R 13
4/16    =  0 R 4

0.3421*16 = 5.4736
0.4736*16 = 7.5776
0.5776*16 = 9.2416
0.2416*16 = 3.8656

(4DB.5793)_16_
